cabana.info: The Cabana rooms are all beachfront rooms, and feature plush head boards, some of these rooms feature walk out from balcony to the beach.
cabana.facilities1: a spacious bathroom featuring a Balinese-style outdoor bathtub
cabana.facilities2: our cosy Cabana has its own garden
cabana.facilities3: an intimate bedroom with a king-sized bed and a sofa bed
